attributes.action: Suspend all arms licenses and weapons sales to Saudi Arabia for use in Yemen
attributes.additional_details:
The weapons the UK government sells to Saudi Arabia and its allies have contributed to the world's worst humanitarian crisis in Yemen. It has been proven that these weapons have been used in Saudi attacks on civilians.

Saudi attacks on civilian gatherings in Yemen include weddings, funerals, marketplaces and hospitals. They have violated International Humanitarian Law and pushed Yemen to the brink of a catastrophe of historic proportions.

We must end the UK's complicity in this tragedy.
attributes.background: The UK Government should immediately suspend all arms licenses for weapons sales to Saudi Arabia and its coalition allies, while these weapons are being used in the war in Yemen.
